title: Frontend Developer
description: Builds the user-facing part of websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.

title: RBI Grade B Officer
description: Central bank officer responsible for monetary policy, banking supervision, and financial stability.

title: NABARD Officer
description: Development banking officer focusing on agriculture and rural development financing.

title: Income Tax Officer
description: Government officer responsible for tax assessment, collection, and compliance enforcement.

title: Customs Officer
description: Officer managing import/export regulations, customs duties, and border security.

title: Central Excise Officer
description: Officer responsible for excise duty collection and manufacturing sector compliance.

title: CAPF Officer (BSF/CRPF/CISF)
description: Central Armed Police Forces officer ensuring internal security and border protection.

title: Forest Service Officer (IFS)
description: Officer managing forest conservation, wildlife protection, and environmental policies.

title: Indian Revenue Service (IRS)
description: Tax administration officer handling direct and indirect tax collection and policy.

title: Indian Audit & Accounts Service (IA&AS)
description: Officer responsible for government audit, accounts, and financial management.

title: Railway Traffic Inspector
description: Officer managing train operations, safety protocols, and traffic coordination.

title: Railway Commercial Clerk
description: Clerk handling ticketing, reservations, and commercial operations in railways.

title: BHEL Engineer
description: Engineer in Bharat Heavy Electricals Limited working on power generation equipment.

title: SAIL Officer
description: Officer in Steel Authority of India Limited managing steel production and operations.

title: ISRO Scientist
description: Scientist working on space research, satellite technology, and space missions.

title: District Collector
description: Senior administrative officer managing district-level governance and development programs.

title: Block Development Officer
description: Officer responsible for rural development programs and grassroots administration.

title: Food Inspector
description: Officer ensuring food safety standards and quality control in food establishments.

title: Drug Inspector
description: Officer monitoring pharmaceutical quality, drug licensing, and regulatory compliance.

title: Assistant Registrar (Cooperative Societies)
description: Officer managing cooperative society registration, audit, and regulatory compliance.

title: Tehsildar
description: Revenue officer managing land records, property disputes, and local administration.

title: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
description: Engineer focused on system reliability, scalability, and performance optimization in production environments.

title: Platform Engineer
description: Engineer building and maintaining internal developer platforms and tooling infrastructure.

title: Prompt Engineer
description: Specialist in designing and optimizing prompts for large language models and AI systems.

title: MLOps Engineer
description: Engineer specializing in deploying, monitoring, and maintaining machine learning models in production.

title: Sustainability Consultant
description: Professional helping organizations implement sustainable practices and environmental compliance.

title: User Experience (UX) Researcher
description: Researcher conducting user studies and analyzing user behavior to improve product experiences.

title: Social Media Manager
description: Professional managing brand presence across social media platforms and digital communities.

title: Grant Writer
description: Professional specializing in writing proposals to secure funding from foundations and government agencies.

title: UPSC Coaching Institute Director
description: Professional managing UPSC coaching institutes and developing civil services preparation programs.

title: Government Relations Manager
description: Professional managing relationships between organizations and government agencies for policy advocacy.

title: Municipal Corporation Officer
description: Officer managing city-level governance, urban planning, and municipal service delivery.

title: Election Officer
description: Officer managing electoral processes, voter registration, and election administration.

title: Investment Banking Analyst
description: Analyst providing financial advisory services, conducting market research, and supporting M&A transactions.

title: Management Consultant
description: Consultant helping organizations improve performance through strategic planning and operational efficiency.

title: Digital Marketing Manager
description: Manager developing and executing digital marketing strategies across multiple channels.

title: Registered Nurse
description: Healthcare professional providing patient care, administering medications, and coordinating treatment plans.

title: Financial Analyst
description: Analyst evaluating financial data, preparing reports, and supporting investment decisions.

title: Human Resources Manager
description: Manager overseeing recruitment, employee relations, and organizational development initiatives.

title: Operations Manager
description: Manager optimizing business operations, managing supply chains, and improving process efficiency.

title: Physician
description: Medical doctor diagnosing and treating patients, developing treatment plans, and providing healthcare services.

title: Elementary School Teacher
description: Educator teaching fundamental subjects to elementary students and fostering their academic development.

title: Foreign Service Officer
description: Diplomat representing national interests abroad, managing international relations and consular services.

title: Intelligence Analyst
description: Analyst gathering and analyzing intelligence data to support national security decisions.

title: Environmental Scientist
description: Scientist studying environmental issues and developing solutions for pollution control and conservation.

title: Social Worker
description: Professional helping individuals and families overcome challenges and access community resources.

title: Urban Planner
description: Planner designing land use plans and policies for sustainable community development.

title: Accountant
description: Professional managing financial records, preparing tax returns, and ensuring regulatory compliance.

title: Marketing Manager
description: Manager developing marketing campaigns, brand strategies, and customer acquisition programs.

title: Sales Manager
description: Manager leading sales teams, developing sales strategies, and managing client relationships.

title: Pharmacist
description: Healthcare professional dispensing medications, providing drug information, and ensuring patient safety.
